thread.title: CEB and Visa offer exclusive sale to holiday destinations
thread.title_full: CEB and Visa offer exclusive sale to holiday destinations

title: CEB and Visa offer exclusive sale to holiday destinations
text:
As low as PHP988 The Philippines leading airline, Cebu Pacific Air (PSE:CEB) and Visa team up to offer amazing all-inclusive seat sale fares to some of the most popular destinations in CEBs network. The seat sale is available until July 9, 201 
To avail of this exclusive seat sale, Visa cardholders only need to input the promotional code VISA through www.cebupacificair.com . Terms & 
The latest seat sales can also be found on CEBs official Twitter (@CebuPacificAir) and Facebook 
CEBs 55-strong fleet is comprised of 10 Airbus A319, 31 Airbus A320, 6 Airbus A330 and 8 ATR 72-500 aircraft. It is one of the most modern aircraft fleet 
About Cebu Air Inc. (PSE: CEB)
